scripts.foundry:build: forge build --force && cp out/Persona.sol/Persona.json abi/ && cp out/PersonaMirror.sol/PersonaMirror.json abi/
scripts.graph:export-abi: yarn foundry:build && cp out/Persona.sol/Persona.json subgraphs/L1/abis/ && cp out/PersonaMirror.sol/PersonaMirror.json subgraphs/L2/abis/
scripts.graph:codegen: yarn graph:export-abi && graph codegen subgraphs/L1/subgraph.yaml -o subgraphs/L1/generated && graph codegen subgraphs/L2/subgraph.yaml -o subgraphs/L2/generated
scripts.graph:build:subgraph: graph build subgraphs/L1/subgraph.yaml -o subgraph-build/L1 && graph build subgraphs/L2/subgraph.yaml -o subgraph-build/L2
scripts.graph:build: yarn graph:export-abi && yarn graph:codegen && yarn graph:build:subgraph
scripts.graph:l1:deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 latticexyz/persona-l1 subgraphs/L1/subgraph.yaml
